attributes.action: Petition: Free TV Licences for over 75’s to continue.
attributes.additional_details:
Definition of Loneliness : sadness because one has no friends or company.

Is this how we want our aged population to live ?
attributes.background: Some of our elderly citizens are house bound or have limited capacity to going out , therefore a TV maybe their only interaction with the outside world for long periods of time. Not all of our elderly are eligible for Pension Credits, therefore this additional cost may not be affordable.
